price: Nuti adabbii dhihoo tahe isin sodaachifne. kan guyyaa namni waan harki lamaan isaa dabarfatte argu, kan kaafirri jedhu "yaa hawwii kiyya! odoon biyyee ta’ee maal qaba".
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā andharnākum ʿadhāban qarīban yawma yanẓuru al-maru mā qaddamat yadāhu wayaqūlu al-kāfiru yālaytanī kuntu turāban
